mapper.insert: insert into item(brand_seq, category_id, item_code, item_name, item_price, item_color, item_size, item_create_date) values(#{brandSeq}, #{categoryId}, #{itemCode}, #{itemName}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemColor}, #{itemSize}, #{itemCreateDate})
mapper.select: select item_seq, brand_seq, category_id, item_code, item_name, item_price, item_color, item_size, item_create_date from item
